scripts.start: enoki content -w & watchify source/index.js -o bundles/bundle.js -t sheetify -p [ css-extract -o bundles/bundle.css ] source/index.js
scripts.dev: enoki content -w & budo source/index.js:bundles/bundle.js --dir . --live -P -- -t sheetify -p [ css-extract -o bundles/bundle.css ] source/index.js
scripts.build: enoki content && browserify source/index.js -o bundles/bundle.js -t yo-yoify -t  [ sheetify -u sheetify-cssnext ] -g es2040 -p [ css-extract -o bundles/bundle.css ] -p tinyify --output public
